responsibilities: Led a team to enhance platform capabilities and worked with the solution team to define development strategies.
Implemented security fixes based on vulnerability assessments (VAPT) to ensure platform stability.
Developed new features and fixed critical issues in the platform.
Migrated application modules from legacy to modern platforms.
Managed client upgrades and transitioned deployments to the latest platform.

details: Specialized coursework in Network Security, Cloud Computing, and Software Architecture.
Active participant in Grama Seva activities and led the house handball team to victory.
